news_header: Police investigate campervan found abandoned in unusual position near Saint-Malo; driver reported unhurt after accident.
news_original_title: Mystery over upturned campervan in Brittany
news_text: Police in western France are investigating an abandoned campervan found in an unusual position by the road near Saint-Malo. Eyewitnesses reported the driver and two passengers left the scene after the accident. The driver later reported to police and was unharmed. Prosecutors have launched an inquiry.
